metadata.description: Comprehensive AI Risk Assessment Database for RFP Analysis
metadata.risk_scoring_methodology: ISO 31000 based with 5x5 matrix (Likelihood x Impact)

1.label: Rare
1.description: May occur only in exceptional circumstances

4.label: Likely
4.description: Will probably occur in most circumstances

5.label: Almost Certain
5.description: Expected to occur in most circumstances

1.label: Insignificant
1.description: Minimal impact on operations, reputation, or compliance
